title: Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description:
Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)

The bug report mentions several suggestions and fixes for the editor selection dialog:

- Multiple selection could be enabled for the associated editors.
- The default entry in the associated editors list could be marked as '(default)' (similar to perspectives).
- Width hint is needed for the dialog.
- The File editors preference page grows in height when selected, but no other pages do the same.

The fixes for suggestions a, c, and f have already been implemented and released, but there is no mention of the fix for suggestion g.

Additional information:

- KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM) released fixes for a, c, f, g.
SR:
MA (09.08.2001 12:04:06)

To reproduce the issue:

1. Open the preference page.
2. Go to 'Workbench' -> 'File Editors'.
3. Without selecting anything from the 'Internal Editors', go to 'External Editors' and select an entry.
4. Switch back to 'Internal Editors' (still with no selection).
5. Press OK.

Expected behavior:

After pressing OK, the selected external editor should be added to the associated editors list.
